> Doom Arrow - A seemingly normal arrow is fired, but it is cursed to 
 do more damage even than an explosive one.

One possiblity could be an arrow that uses 10% of available mana.

(Yes, I'm strongly in favor of attacks that use a percentage available 
mana rather than a fixed amount of mana.)

If you are going to have a "Beserk" attack for an orc that increases 
its damage points, it should have some weaknesses like either the orc 
goes after all nearby characters or the orc is harder to control.
